Plot: Over the summer, a series of unfortunate happening triggers a financial crisis for a young woman and she soon finds her life falling apart.
Title: Wendy and Lucy
Writer: Jonathan Raymond, Jonathan Raymond (story), Kelly Reichardt
Actors: Michelle Williams, Lucy, David Koppell, Max Clement
tomatoConsensus: Michelle Williams gives a heartbreaking performance in Wendy and Lucy, a timely portrait of loneliness and struggle.
